apiKeyManagement.title: API Key Management
apiKeyManagement.description: Generate and manage API keys for external integrations
apiKeyManagement.infoText: Generate API keys to securely submit data from external applications like iPhone Shortcuts. These keys are tied to your account and can be revoked at any time.
apiKeyManagement.wikiWarning: Refer to the Wiki page in Github for sample setup instructions for iPhone and Android.
apiKeyManagement.deleteApiKeyConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this API key? This action cannot be undone.

accountSecurity.verifyNewEmail: You'll need to verify your new email address
accountSecurity.passwordLengthError: Password must be at least 6 characters long
accountSecurity.enterNewEmailAddress: Please enter a new email address

authenticationSettings.description: Manage authentication methods and OIDC providers.

loginManagement.title: Login Management
loginManagement.description: Enable or disable different methods for users to log in.
loginManagement.emergencyFailSafeDescription: If you are ever locked out of your account, you can force email/password login to be enabled by setting the following environment variable on your server and restarting it:

backupSettings.title: Backup Settings
backupSettings.description: Configure scheduled backups and restore options
backupSettings.errorLoadingSettings: Could not load global backup settings.
backupSettings.restoreWarningImportantText: This backup functionality is new and should be used with caution. While it creates a backup, it's highly recommended to create additional backups independently of this application. Always follow the 3-2-1 backup strategy (3 copies of your data, on 2 different media, with 1 copy offsite) to ensure data safety. The functionality of restore may not work properly in all scenarios, so do not rely solely on this in-app backup.
backupSettings.restoreWarningCautionText: Restoring a backup will wipe all current data and replace it with the backup content. Proceed with extreme caution. Restart the server manually after restoring.
backupSettings.restoreConfirm: WARNING: Restoring a backup will wipe all current data and replace it with the backup content. Are you absolutely sure you want to proceed?
backupSettings.restoringBackup: Restoring backup... This may take a while.

oidcSettings.title: OIDC Authentication Providers
oidcSettings.description: Manage OIDC providers for user authentication.
oidcSettings.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this provider?
oidcSettings.fillDetails: Fill in the details for the OIDC provider.
oidcSettings.defaultsRestored: OIDC provider fields have been reset to their default values.
oidcSettings.redirectUriInfo: The Redirect URI for your OIDC provider should be: SPARKY_FITNESS_FRONTEND_URL/oidc-callback
oidcSettings.localhostWarning: Ensure your OIDC provider allows localhost or your local IP for development.
oidcSettings.proxyWarning: If using a proxy like Nginx Proxy Manager, ensure the following headers are configured:

userManagement.failedToSaveFullName: Failed to save user full name.

userManagement.toggleUserStatusConfirm: Are you sure you want to {{action}} user {{userName}}?
userManagement.toggleUserRoleConfirm: Are you sure you want to change user {{userName}}'s role to {{newRole}}?

goalsSettings.title: Goals Settings
goalsSettings.changesCascadeInfo: (Changes cascade for 6 months from today or until your next future goal)
goalsSettings.goalsUpdatedSuccess: Goals updated and will apply for the next 6 months (or until your next future goal)
goalsSettings.errorSavingGoals: An unexpected error occurred while saving goals
goalsSettings.noGoalPresets: No goal presets defined yet. Create one to get started!
goalsSettings.deletePresetConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this preset?
goalsSettings.defineReusableGoals: Define a reusable set of nutrition and exercise goals.
goalsSettings.noWeeklyPlans: No weekly goal plans defined yet. Create one to automate your goals!
goalsSettings.deleteWeeklyPlanConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this weekly plan?
goalsSettings.defineWeeklySchedule: Define a recurring weekly schedule for your goals.
goalsSettings.resetOnboardingDescription: Reset your onboarding status to revisit the initial questionnaire. You will be signed out after resetting.
goalsSettings.resetOnboardingConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset your onboarding status? This will restart the onboarding process.
goalsSettings.resetOnboardingSuccess: Onboarding status has been reset. The page will now reload.
goalsSettings.pleaseSignIn: Please sign in to manage your goals.
goalsSettings.dateSpecificGoalCleared: Date-specific goal cleared. Default or weekly plan will now apply.
goalsSettings.errorClearingDateSpecificGoal: An unexpected error occurred while clearing the goal
goalsSettings.changesApplyToDate: Changes will only apply to this specific date.
goalsSettings.selectGoalPreset: Select a goal preset to apply
